main event: A military report details the visual and radar observation of a stationary, oblong object over Nevada on August 21, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as having a red end and a green end with a glowing white center., The object was visually tracked at a distance of 1.0 miles and at an elevation of 15,000 feet., Ground and air observers reported the object as making erratic movements., Radar analysis suggested that the returns might have been due to a weather phenomenon., The observation lasted for 3 hours and 15 minutes.
witness description: ground observers and air visual observers from compatible bases
